parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current formation of a group.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[String]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''formation''' grp

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> grp: [[Object]] or [[Group]] </value></part><part><name> </name>=<value> P1

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] -  returns either "COLUMN", "STAG COLUMN", "WEDGE", "ECH LEFT", "ECH RIGHT", "VEE" or "LINE"
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>formation [[group]] [[player]]</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Mission_Editor:_Waypoints#Formation|formations description]], [[formLeader]], [[setFormation]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on January 9, 2007 - 03:16</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ColonelSandersLite|ColonelSandersLite]]<dd class="note"><br>
Additional ARMA Formations: "File" - Column Compact. "DIAMOND" - Delta.<br>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
